metadata.title: CVE-2018-19970 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - medium.
metadata.description: In phpMyAdmin before 4.8.4, an XSS vulnerability was found in the navigation tree, where an attacker can deliver a payload to a user through a crafted database/table name. It was discovered that phpMyAdmin incorrectly handled user input. An attacker could possibly use this for an XSS attack.

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '4:4.9.2+dfsg1-1').
